entities.name: pierre bonaccord
entities.description: Pierre Bonaccord is the Wizard who was appointed, but his appointment was contested by the Wizarding community of Liechtenstein. (Chapter 31)

entities.name: liechtenstein
entities.description: The Wizarding community of Liechtenstein is contesting Pierre Bonaccord's appointment. (Chapter 31)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is trying to figure out why Pierre Bonaccord's appointment was contested. (Chapter 31)

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is Harry's classmate, and he is trying to perform Legilimency on her to figure out the reason for the breach. (Chapter 31)

entities.name: trolls
entities.description: Trolls are a type of creature that Pierre Bonaccord wanted to give rights to, but Liechtenstein is having problems with them. (Chapter 31)

relationships.description: Pierre Bonaccord's appointment was contested by the Wizarding community of Liechtenstein. (Chapter 31)
Pierre Bonaccord wanted to give rights to trolls, but Liechtenstein is having problems with them. (Chapter 31)
Liechtenstein is having problems with a tribe of particularly vicious mountain trolls. (Chapter 31)
